paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: variant-type transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRv) with symptoms including heart failure and macroglossia

individual_records.phenotype_details: Heart failure with left ventricular hypertrophy, macroglossia, and progressive deterioration despite treatment.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing confirmed a mutation in V122I, variant-type transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRv).

functional_data.summary: The V122I mutation in TTR is associated with variant-type amyloidosis, leading to amyloid deposition in tissues.

variants.additional_notes: The patient exhibited atypical manifestations for ATTRv, complicating the clinical picture.
key_quotes: Genetic testing confirmed a mutation in V122I, variant-type transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRv).
Despite the administration of patisiran, her condition exhibited progressive deterioration.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the case report.
